tool.name: FastSpar reduce
tool.description: Filter correlation and p-value table into sparse matrices
tool.command: fastspar_reduce --correlation_table $correlation_table --pvalue_table $pvalue_table --correlation $correlation --pvalue $pvalue --output_prefix sparse && cp sparse_filtered_correlation.tsv $correlations && cp sparse_filtered_pvalue.tsv $pvalues
tool.help:
*FastSpar reduce* extracts entries of the correlation and pvalue tables, which fulfil both threshold values for the respective tables.
Both tables should be symmetric matrices of the following form:
======= ====== ====== ====== ====== .. 1 3 2 ... ======= ====== ====== ====== ====== **1** 1.0000 0.7265 0.0656 **3** 0.7265 1.0000 0.0615 **2** 0.0656 0.0615 1.0000 **...** ======= ====== ====== ====== ======
Additionally, the row and column ids of both tables must have an identical order.
